title: Dark Flame Vi concept splash art - BLADE CLAWS!
body:
After seeing the Dark Flame Shivana skin which I really liked, I decided to create a Vi concept version of with the same Dark Flame idea (I just could not help myself with the big ass claws).  With the help of ZeroNis's face reference I painted up this Dark Flame Vi concept splash art piece in Photoshop, and had some fun.  ps. If this became a skin you can literally take all my money >.< 
[Dark Flame Vi -  Imgur](http://imgur.com/fNIEifS)

- Photoshop cc
- Intuos Pro
